attributes.action: make over packaging of products sold in the uk illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many products in the uk, especially food, are overpackaged to the point that the consumer is led to believe that the package contains much more of the content than it actually does. Not only is this misleading and deceitful to consumers, it is also highly wasteful and totally unjustifable

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
